mapper.update: UPDATE video SET del_status=1 WHERE del_status=0 AND id=#{videoId}
mapper.select: select * from video,car where video.car_id = car.id and video.site_id=-1 and video.del_status=0
select * from video where del_status=1 and site_id =-1
select * from video where video.del_status=0 and license like CONCAT('%',#{license},'%')
select * from video,car,user where video.car_id = car.id and car.driver_id=user.id and user.id=#{driverId} and video.del_status=0
select * from video where video.car_id = #{carId} AND video.del_status=0
select * from video,site where video.site_id = site.id and car_id=-1 and video.del_status=0
select * from site where id not in( select site_id from video where del_status=0 )
select * from video,site where video.site_id = #{siteId} AND video.del_status=0 and video.site_id=site.id
